title: Jackson, Mississippi.  A year after the freedom rides, segregation signs still stand outside the bus terminal.
marks: \"R.L.\" and \"#8\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelt \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: four military recruiting signs, a No Parking sign and a sign reading \"White Waiting Room\" on the sidewalk by a curving street
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
